Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm terrible at building spaceships, could I get a craft file for a really good interplanetary spaceship? one good enough to get to Duna or Eve, without any refueling. The only mods it can have are KW rocketry, mechjeb, and (B9 aerospace, older version).

Thanks!

SpaceshipFood
Can't you just look for one yourself?

Hey there,

Take the Minnow for a spin, it'll get you to Duna and back quite happily (or a one way ticket to Eve). The R-type will also do it but is a little more challenging to land. Good luck.

Cupcake...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27424-Cupcake-s-Spaceship-Bazar

Hi,

I'm terrible at building spaceships, could I get a craft file for a really good interplanetary spaceship? one good enough to get to Duna or Eve, without any refueling. The only mods it can have are KW rocketry, mechjeb, and (B9 aerospace, older version).

Thanks!

SpaceshipFood

Are you just bad at making rockets so that they can get there or just bad at getting to there?

Cause if it's the latter, use cheats.
